english.segment1: If I was a rainbow I'd show my colors for You. If I was a songbird I'd sing my song for You. And if You take the sun and the moon. Take away the stars at night. Your faithful Word will always be my light
english.segment2: Beautiful such a miracle. That You would give up Heaven just for me. All I wanna do is fall more in love with You. This world doesn't owe me anymore. And one thing that I do know for sure
